matteridge
==========

.. sidebar:: Useful links

   `Source <https://codeberg.org/slidge/matteridge>`_

   `Chat room <xmpp:slidge@conference.nicoco.fr?join>`_

   `Bug tracker <https://codeberg.org/slidge/matteridge/issues>`_


A
`feature-rich <user/features.html>`_
`Mattermost <https://mattermost.com>`_ to
`XMPP <https://xmpp.org/>`_ puppeteering
`gateway <https://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0100.html>`_, based on
`slidge <https://slidge.im>`_ and
`mattermost-api-reference-client <https://git.sr.ht/~nicoco/mattermost-api-reference-client>`_.
